alert.note: Alert for Eastern Greene (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 1:02PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Greene County through 145 PM EDT... At 102 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of North-South Lake Campground, or 9 miles northwest of Catskill, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, half inch hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water. Locations impacted include... Cairo, Greenville Center, Round Top, Result, Earlton, Sanfords Corners, Sunside, Climax, Hannacroix, Cairo Junction, Place Corners, Three Town Bridge, Medway, South Durham, Paradise Hill, Gayhead, Grapeville, Surprise, Newrys and Acra. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
